name: typescript-boilerplate-2021
description: Boilerplate for TypeScript projects (Node.js and browser modules)
author: Chris Hager <chris@linuxuser.at>

scripts.update: aws --profile cibo --region us-east-1 lambda update-function-code     --function-name main-maeve-tf-local  --zip-file fileb://scripts/lambda.zip
scripts.dev: yarn cp-types && nodemon --watch src/ --ext ts --exec 'yarn deploy'
scripts.invoke: aws --region us-east-1  lambda invoke --function-name main-maeve-local  --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out  --payload=file://events/test.json  out --log-type Tail --query 'LogResult' --output text |  base64 -d && echo "--------------------- " && cat out
